projects.title: ECommerce Monstera Store Inspiration
projects.description: My case study prototype project in Google where I learned about entry-level in user experience (UX) design.

projects.title: Skin Disease Identification through Image Classification and Segmentation using Deep Learning
projects.description: The aim of this project is to reduce the cases of skin lesion diseases. For the model processing, we studied and utilized a convolutional neural network. This is our thesis project.
projects.status: This project is still in development.

projects.title: Laboratory Information System
projects.description: working on a 2 microservice-based system for Wren Laboratories, focusing on processing Covid-19 and cancer PCR test samples for both patients and physicians.
projects.status: This project is deployed and private.

projects.title: Domicilium Service Portal
projects.description: A system that allows clients to buy services from Domicilium under various brands and enables Admins to access and manage these services.
projects.status: This project is deployed and private.
